title: Japanese beef and potato curry
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'Pinch freshly ground black pepper', '450g diced beef', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '700 ml beef stock', '2 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '2 carrots, diced', '4 tablespoons rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon treacle', '3 potatoes, cubed']
